Source.name: EBS Sensor: HCM PAY Invalid Balance Attributes - Monthly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: HCM PAY Invalid Balance Attributes - Monthly
Source.Description: Invalid balance attributes identified. These need to be corrected.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_HCM_PAY_INVALID_BALANCE_ATTRIBUTES' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'legislation_code:' || s.legislation_code || ', business_group_id:' || s.business_group_id || ', ATTRIBUTE_NAME:' || s.ATTRIBUTE_NAME || ', balance_name:' || s.balance_name || ', DIMENSION_NAME:' || s.DIMENSION_NAME || ', save_run_balance:' || s.save_run_balance key_data FROM (SELECT pba.legislation_code legislation_code, pba.business_group_id business_group_id, BAD.ATTRIBUTE_NAME ATTRIBUTE_NAME ,PBT.balance_name balance_name ,DIM.DIMENSION_NAME DIMENSION_NAME ,PDB.save_run_balance save_run_balance FROM apps.PAY_BALANCE_ATTRIBUTES PBA , apps.PAY_BAL_ATTRIBUTE_DEFINITIONS BAD , apps.PAY_DEFINED_BALANCES PDB , apps.PAY_BALANCE_TYPES PBT , apps.PAY_BALANCE_DIMENSIONS DIM Where pba.attribute_id = bad.attribute_id and pba.defined_balance_id = pdb.defined_balance_id and pdb.balance_type_id = pbt.balance_type_id and pdb.balance_dimension_id = dim.balance_dimension_id and DIM.DIMENSION_NAME like '%Run%' and pdb.save_run_balance is NULL and ((pba.legislation_code is not null and pba.business_group_id is NULL) OR (pba.business_group_id is not null and pba.legislation_code is NULL)) and rownum < 100 order by 1,2) s
